original_title: THE GREAT OUTDOORS II:  SPECIAL EDITION
overview: There is always more to a story....  The second edition of The Great Outdoors gave motocross fans a taste of what it was like to experience the sensational 2003 National Championship Motocross series from an up-close and personal perspective.  Now, the directors and producers of The Great Outdoors have created an all-new version of their epic documentary which features well over 70 minutes of never before seen on the track footage.  Experience first-hand, all the sweat, drama and dedication of what it is to be a true privateer on the National Championship circuit.  Witness the emotion and mayhem that goes on not only between rider and mechanic at a national, but between the rider and machine, as well.  The New Great Outdoors 2003 Special Edition is a motocross film more than worthy of a special place in your motocross DVD collection.
title: THE GREAT OUTDOORS II:  SPECIAL EDITION
